channel.title: Cases
channel.description:
Hello can somone tekk me what cased do?
and is it like case 2133; //ect are id 2133 in ect object?
happy for answers -meele

item.title: Cases
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Well, I find this in 90% of the sources if you click an item or an object that currently has no case to it, you can look in your run CMD and find it says something like this

[Telenim]: Clicking Action Button: 4140 (Varrock Teleport) - Action accepted
But if it has a case to that ID, then you will just have to search for an empty case or find what the current action is such as, you wanted to find an object (portal) to teleport you to Pest Control, but that ID was already being used, and you know that it sends a message
sendMessage("Welcome to pest control");
you could simply search for that in your Client Class, and it would show up with the whole case, and you will be able to edit that.

Read full topic

item.title: Cases
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:2, topic:285204”]Depends, I suppose.

There is

Case 185:

which holds crap like, clicking buttons in the quest tab or such, most sources like DeltaScape have made another class for it though “clickingMost”, which is what Case 185 is, if you notice most sources have

Case 185: //Clicking Most
Case 20614: //Clicking testSend button in Quest Tab
msgS("Test, I guess it works if you're reading this in-game :D");
RemoveAllWindows();
break;

case 4140://Varrock
TelePosition("Varrock", 0);
teleported = true;
break;

And most things like that.[/quote]
ok but how i find out how case i have to use ect if i wanna make a teleport tab ect?

or like if we click a item/object…
ect if the item is the champion scroll… how we make a text there then?

Read full topic

item.title: Cases
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Depends, I suppose.

There is

Case 185:

which holds crap like, clicking buttons in the quest tab or such, most sources like DeltaScape have made another class for it though “clickingMost”, which is what Case 185 is, if you notice most sources have

Case 185: //Clicking Most
Case 20614: //Clicking testSend button in Quest Tab
msgS("Test, I guess it works if you're reading this in-game :D");
RemoveAllWindows();
break;

case 4140://Varrock
TelePosition("Varrock", 0);
teleported = true;
break;

And most things like that.

Read full topic
